summary: This node allows you to edit an image by applying operations like blur, resize, adding borders, text, and more.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the image, such as blur, border, resize, text, etc.

parameters.name: dataPropertyName
parameters.description: Name of the binary property where the image data is stored.

parameters.name: operations
parameters.description: Specify multiple operations to perform in a sequence, applicable when 'Operation' is set to 'Multi Step'.
